content: The Reign of the Lord’s Anointed.
And why do the people devise a vain  hopeless plot?
The kings of the earth take their stand;
And the rulers take counsel together
Against the  and His Anointed (the Davidic King, the Messiah, the Christ), saying,
“Let us break apart their [divine] bands [of restraint]
And cast away their cords [of control] from us.”
